Name: Reboot & Foundation
Gate Criteria: Team committed, dashboard live, standing call running

Name: Design & Prototyping
Gate Criteria: Design freeze approved by all stakeholders

Name: Brand Identity & IP
Gate Criteria: Trademark filed, logo approved, brand guide complete

Name: Manufacturing & Supply Chain
Gate Criteria: T1 samples approved, production order confirmed

Name: Licensing (CLC/Fanatics)
Gate Criteria: CLC approval + at least 3 school licenses

Name: Go-To-Market Preparation
Gate Criteria: Store live, marketing assets ready, waitlist building

Name: Launch & Operations
Gate Criteria: Successful launch, positive feedback, reorder triggered
